column4: is it possible to update 8.04 directly to 9.10 version using a CD?
No. You can only upgrade from 8.04 to 8.10 OR to 10.04 when it is released.
aha, so it can be updatet to 10.04. is that an option that wasn't available with previous releases? (i mean to skip versions in between)
You'll always be able to upgrade directly from one LTS to the next LTS.
